text: Massimo Ghirotto (born 25 June 1961, in Boara Pisani) is an Italian former road bicycle racer. ==Major results== ;1987 :1st, Trofeo Baracchi :1st, Trofeo Matteotti :1st, Coppa Placci :1st, Stage 10, Tour de Suisse ;1988 :1st, GP Industria & Artigianato di Larciano :1st, Stage 13, Tour de France ;1989 :1st, Stage 6, Vuelta a España ;1990 :1st, Giro dell'Umbria :1st, Stage 9, Tour de France ;1991 :1st, Stage 4, Giro del Trentino :1st, Stage 9, Giro d'Italia ;1992 :1st, Giro del Veneto :1st, Tre Valli Varesine :1st, Wincanton Classic ;1993 :1st, Tre Valli Varesine :1st, Stage 20, Giro d'Italia :Combativity award, Tour de France ;1994 :1st, Vuelta a los Valles Mineros :1st, Stage 19, Giro d'Italia == External links == *Palmarès by cyclingbase.com *Palmarès by museociclismo.it Category:1961 births Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Living people Category:Italian Giro d'Italia stage winners Category:Italian Tour de France stage winners Category:Italian Vuelta a España stage winners Category:People from the Province of Padua Category:Tour de Suisse stage winners Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Massimo Ghirotto
